JavaLog
Class LogicKnowledge

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--JavaLog.LogicModule
        |
        +--JavaLog.LogicKnowledge
public class LogicKnowledge
extends LogicModule

This class represents logic knowledge represented by means of logic clauses. It provides methods for querying and manipulating the clauses.

This class is used by Brain and Perprocessor.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $ $ProjectDate: Thu, 10 Jun 1999 17:11:12 -0300 $
See Also:
Brain, Preprocessor, Serialized Form
